notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

body.p: The following Scandinavians bought or sold real estate in Chicago recently:
Thomas P. Leonard to John Ericson: Beacon Street and Wilson Avenue. Price, $5,000.
Chares S. Driever to Gustav A. Malmgren: Dover Street and Montrose Avenue. Price, $7,500.
John M. Johnson to Wm. Brown: Otto and Herndon Streets. Price, $2,400.
William Fletcher to Nora K. Johnson: Sawyer and Cullum Avenues. Price, $3,500.
Andrew B. Hansen to Christ Hansen: 93rd Street and Marquette Avenue. Price, $2,500.
Carl T. Olesen to McCabe: Winchester Avenue and 56th Street. Price, $7,500.
L. Bryerton to J. C. Rasmussen: Monticello and Potomac Avenues. Price, $2,500.
Joseph Winterbethham to Aug. P. Petersen: 40th and Potomac Avenues. Price, $6,000.
